name: Dodging Beats (bloo-apple)
description:
Can you dodge the beats? They come at you from all different directions. This game has 10 different songs to play, 6 Characters to choose from, 3 power-ups in game-play, and you can customize all your settings. Can you unlock all 23 achievements? 

Game Play: Finish the song without getting hit 3 times for achievements. Collect 5 collectables per level for achievements.

Power-ups: Timers to slow down time. Shields for extra health. Bombs! Double tap to blast enemies away.

Extra Features: 5 achievable apples.

Customize your Settings: Disable/Enable Light trails. Disable/Enable Scrolling Background. Disable/Enable Virtual Joystick.  Disable/Enable Power-Ups. 1 or 2 Bite Mode. Reset High-scores. Change default volume.

Enjoy.
